descrip.0: Matches favorite music genres across participants
descrip.1: Matches political attitude on a Liberal-Conservative scale (LIB3 = Very Liberal, CON3 = Very Conservative)

filter_cats.0: Each music genre has its own filter.
filter_cats.1: Political attitudes can be selected individually or by category.
filter_cats.2: Each school year has its own filter.
filter_cats.3:
Scale ranges from 0 to 1. 
Not sad=0 
Mildly sad=0.1-0.3 
Sad=0.4-0.7 
Super sad=0.8-1.0.
filter_cats.4:
Scale ranges from 0 to 1. 
No stress=0 
Mild stress=0.1-0.3 
Stressed=0.4-0.7 
Stressball!!=0.8-1.0.
filter_cats.5:
Scale ranges from 0 to 1. 
No exercise=0 
Light exercise=0.1-0.3 
Avg exercise=0.4-0.7 
Crazy exercise=0.8-1.0.
